name: Hotline Houston
description:
Fight off eldritch horrors from another dimension, on a derelict spaceship using weapons you find scattered throughout. Space has never felt so daunting.

WASD to move

1234 number keys to change weapons

Space key to open doors

Link to the wiki page for our game.
